tools.name: osintGoogleDork
tools.description: Performs advanced Google Dorking for OSINT on a target domain. Leverages specific search operators to find sensitive information indexed by Google.

args.name: dork_type
args.description: The type of information to search for.

args.name: keywords
args.description: Optional additional keywords to include in the search.

args.name: filetype
args.description: Required if dork_type is 'files'. Specifies the file extension.
